price: 4. Tohul sin dambitte siinih cabeleeh, qumri siinih wadirroyse Íe yimixxige waktî fanah, Diggah Yalli mekle wakti (Raba kinnuk) yamaate waqdi, mawadirroysima, isin woh yaaxige mará akkinnitoonuy iimaanâ fanah asissikuk tenen.
arabic: يَغۡفِرۡ لَكُم مِّن ذُنُوبِكُمۡ وَيُؤَخِّرۡكُمۡ إِلَىٰٓ أَجَلٖ مُّسَمًّىۚ إِنَّ أَجَلَ ٱللَّهِ إِذَا جَآءَ لَا يُؤَخَّرُۚ لَوۡ كُنتُمۡ تَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: yaghfir lakum min dhunūbikum wayu-akhir'kum ilā ajalin musamman inna ajala al-lahi idhā jāa lā yu-akharu law kuntum taʿlamūna
